title: [Health] Life expectancy in the United States declined 1.87 years from 2019 to after the emergence of the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020, more than any of 21 other high-income countriesâ€”with greater losses in Hispanic and Black populations

[Medicine] E-cigarettes alter inflammatory state of brain, heart, lungs and colon. Effects also vary depending on the e-cigarette flavor, and can influence how organs respond to infections, such as SARS-CoV-2. This is the first to assess JUUL devices and their flavorants in a multi-organ fashion.
